## AlRoute.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `AlRoute` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(host: AlRoutingHost, /* Link to the routing host, which exposes current routing context, routing parameters, and actions that influence the environment */ definition: AlRouteDefinition, /* The raw data of the route */ parent?: AlRoute | undefined);
```
